text: Khondaker Mostaq Ahmad (also spelled Khandakar Mushtaq Ahmed; â€“ 5 March 1996) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was the President of Bangladesh from 15 August to 6 November 1975, after the assassination of Sheikh Mujibur Rahman.
